title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1093/96 of 18 June 1996 fixing the coefficients for reducing the compensatory payments granted under Council Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 in the 1996/97 marketing year in certain regions of the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1093/96 of  18 June 1996 fixing the coefficients for reducing the compensatory payments granted under Council  Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92 in the 1996/97 marketing year in certain regions of the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Pursuant to Article 3 (6) of Regulation (EEC) No 1765/92, the  compensatory payments for the 1996/97 marketing year shall be multiplied by a coefficient of 0,996  in the case of France.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 June 1996.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
